data.title: Dhemajis Pig Sub Sector Current Status C
data.meta_description: Dhemajis Pig Sub Sector Current Status c - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. This document provides an overview of the pig sub-sector in Dhemaji district of Assam, India. It examines the current status, constraints and opportunities of pig production and marketing in the region. The document begins with background information on Dhemaji district and the role of pigs in the local rural economy. It then analyzes the marketing of pigs and pork, including projections of supply and demand. It also evaluates current pig production systems, policies and institutions supporting the sector. The conclusion provides recommendations to address key issues identified, with the aim of improving livelihoods through sustainable development of the local pig industry.
